details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.9 XMP Package - All properties are defined
details.description: Properties specified in XMP form shall use either the predefined schemas defined in XMP Specification, or extension schemas that comply with XMP Specification

rule.description: Properties specified in XMP form shall use either the predefined schemas defined in XMP Specification, or extension schemas that comply with XMP Specification
